injected_file_content_bytes.description: The number of bytes of content allowed for each injected file.

metadata_items.description: The number of metadata items allowed for each instance.

server_group_members.description: The number of members allowed for each server group.

server_groups.description: The number of server groups allowed for each tenant.

ram.description: The amount of instance RAM in megabytes allowed for each tenant.

floating_ips.description: The number of floating IP addresses allowed for each tenant.

key_pairs.description: The number of key pairs allowed for each user.

id.description: The ID for the quota set.

instances.description: The number of instances allowed for each tenant.

security_group_rules.description: The number of rules allowed for each security group.

injected_files.description: The number of injected files allowed for each tenant.

cores.description: The number of instance cores allowed for each tenant.

fixed_ips.description:
The number of fixed IP addresses allowed for each tenant. Must be
equal to or greater than the number of allowed instances.

injected_file_path_bytes.description: The number of bytes allowed for each injected file path.

security_groups.description: The number of security groups allowed for each tenant.
